summary.para: The TTPOLYGONHEADER structure specifies the starting position and type of a contour in a TrueType character outline.

remarks.para: Each TTPOLYGONHEADER structure is followed by one or more structures.

summary.para: The number of bytes required by the TTPOLYGONHEADER structure and structure or structures required to describe the contour of the character.
The type of character outline returned. Currently, this value must be TT_POLYGON_TYPE.
The starting point of the contour in the character outline.
